titleStmt.title: The marrow of Christianity, or, A spirituall discovery of some principles of truth meet to be knowne of all the saints : represented in ten sections / by T. Collier ; whereunto is added an epistle, written by M. Saltmarsh.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Thomas, fl. 1691.
Saltmarsh, M.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Sumptner for Giles Calvert,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages cropped and stained with loss of print.
